title: Make all modal dialog backgrounds fully opaque solid white (including overlay)

requirements.text: Update global styling so all shadcn/Radix Dialog overlays render as fully opaque solid white (no transparency, no opacity utilities, no backdrop blur), ensuring the underlying page is not visible when any modal dialog is open.

quotes: remove all transparencies and opacity. all backgrounds for all pop-out dialogs should be solid white

acceptanceCriteria: When any modal dialog is opened (e.g., Add Resident, Edit Resident, Add/Edit Medication, Add MAR, Add ADL, Add Daily Vitals, Add Weight), the full-screen overlay is pure solid white and fully opaque (no translucency).
With a modal open, the page behind it is not visible through the overlay.
There is no backdrop blur effect on the dialog overlay.

requirements.text: Ensure every modal dialog panel/content background is fully opaque solid white (not semi-transparent), by auditing all dialog components and removing/replacing any Tailwind opacity/translucent background utilities applied to dialog containers.

quotes: remove all transparencies and opacity. all backgrounds for all pop-out dialogs should be solid white

acceptanceCriteria: All DialogContent panels render with a solid white background in both light and dark modes (no alpha backgrounds).
No dialog panel uses Tailwind `opacity-*` utilities or alpha color syntax (e.g., `bg-*/xx`) that results in visible transparency.
Visual regression check: opening each of the existing dialogs shows a consistent solid white panel and solid white overlay.

constraints: Do not edit any files under frontend/src/components/ui (shadcn/ui sources are read-only); implement styling changes via global CSS overrides and/or by adjusting className usage in non-immutable component files.
Use English for any user-facing text.
nonGoals: Changing non-dialog UI translucency across the entire app (e.g., page gradients, cards, buttons) unless it directly affects dialog overlays/panels.
